entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MDT Saturday 18 March 2023
